<div class="treeview">
<onlyinclude>** {{nbt|int|minecraft:dyed_color}}: The color applied of this [[leather armor]] or [[wolf armor]] item. More generally, it is used as the <code>minecraft:dye</code> color provider in [[Items_model_definition|item model definitions]]. If present on an item, a gray and italic "Dyed" text is added to the tooltip (If you have "Advanced tooltips" on, you will see it an non-italic "Color: {{cd|#<hex color code>}}" instead). Color codes are the hex code of the color converted to a decimal number, or can be calculated from the red, green and blue components using this formula:<br>'''({{color|Red}} <abbr title="Logical left shift">&lt;&lt;</abbr> 16) + ({{color|Green}} &lt;&lt; 8) + {{color|Blue}}'''<ref group="note">For positive values larger than <samp>0x00FFFFFF</samp>, the top byte is ignored. All negative values produce white.</ref> {{Calculator|decimalColor}}
** {{nbt|list|minecraft:dyed_color}}: Another format. A list containing 3 floats corresponding to red, green and blue values as a fraction (ranged 0 to 1, inclusive) that is automatically converted to the int format.
</onlyinclude></div><noinclude>
